pr_title: Add debug logging when getting config response and polling internal q…

timeline.message: Add debug logging when getting config response and polling internal queue

timeline.bodyText:
Consider using a lambda instead to ensure toString is only invoked if debug-logging is enabled.
log.log(LogLevel.DEBUG, () -> "OK response received in handleOkRequest: " + jrtReq);
timeline.author: bjorncs

replies.bodyText: Yes, thanks, forgot that this time, fixed
replies.author: hmusum

timeline.message: Use lambda in debug log line
